answers.answer: okay let me reword that which flavor is the least gross?
The orange tastes like orange HIC it was really good to me.
I had the orange which wasn't bad, but not all drs give you a choice.
I had lemon lime. It wasn't bad. It tasted like a flat soda

With my first pregnancy I was given a choice of lemon lime or orange. But my last pregnancy and this current one they just gave me orange. They said that everyone preferred the orange. Which I agree. The lemon lime was so sweet that I gagged on it. The orange was a lot better!
I didn't have a choice and was given fruit punch. I liked it
I thought the orange one was really good!
If you have a choice orange the lemon lime tastes like sprite syrup.  Just did it yesterday.  Yuck
I like theOrange one the fruit punch tasted like medicine to me :P
The orange doesn't taste as bad as people say I just chugged it really fast and forgot about it!
thanks guys! I got the orange and it wasn't good but it wasn't totally terrible either. I didn't throw up so that's a plus lol
I haven't had to have the test during pregnancy yet.. only 16w5d, but I've had to be tested for diabetes & I had the fruit punch flavor.. it was good, just too much on an empty stomach lol
I've had all 3... orange was the most tolerable, lemon lime the least tolerable... fruit punch was way too sweet for me... but better than lemon lime... either way they need to be cold
